attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Comments made recently by Clarkson whilst in Australia about our Prime Minister are snide and unacceptable. Whilst he, or others, may not agree with the political position of the Prime Minister and or government, such personal attacks are unacceptable and  have no place in a civilised society. When delivered from across the world, they must be viewed as especially cowardly and subversive

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
